text: The Persian Gulf Studies Center () abbreviated to PGSC, is an Institute of historical, geographical, geopolitical and strategic studies of the Persian gulf. This study center is a Non Governmental Organization and is handled and managed by voluntary donations in Iran.Wikipedia contributors, «Persian Gulf Studies Center». Persian Wikipedia. (Retrieved at July 29, 2016)«defending the name "Persian Gulf" in the world» (in Persian) at Fars News Agency. Retrieved July 29, 2016.«Persian Gulf symbol of Iranian glory, history» at Mehr News Agency. Retrieved July 29, 2016. «Persian Gulf Studies Center». Retrieved July 29, 2016. ==Publications== Documents on the Persian Gulfs name2009Edition The center has published many books, atlases and articles in Persian language and held many seminars and festivals.
